thread.section_title: Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Stay in Paris!
thread.title_full: Perfect Stay in Paris! - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ehill70
title: Perfect Stay in Paris!
text: Wonderful hotel tucked away behind Boulevard Saint-Germain, Boulevard Saint-Michel and next to L'Église Saint-Séverin. Friendly staff and spotlessly clean rooms with well-appointed design and comfortable beds. Perfect location for exploring the city. Great restaurants and shopping within walking distance. This hotel is now on the top of my Paris favorites!
